TolleyThis! brings the best of Tolley+™ to wherever you are on the web. With powerful search at your fingertips and integration into Google, it's never been this easy to find the answers you need.

—————————
KEY FEATURES
—————————

★ Tolley search results in Google
Whenever you run a Google search, you'll now get direct access to Tolley search results automatically.

★ Right-click search without disrupting your workflow
Run a search from any web page by highlighting your keywords, right-click and then TolleyThis! Instantly see the results appear without moving away from the page you're on.

★ Start a search right from your browser search bar
Start a search by typing in "Tolley" followed by your keywords then hit enter to run your search. This will take you straight into Tolley+™ where you can review, filter and view the full breadth of content.

★ Integrated in Microsoft 365
Get Tolley search results in Microsoft 365 for direct access to Tolley content in the place where you work and collaborate. Use the source filtering to refine your search results and review search summaries without disrupting your workflow.


—————————
FAQ
—————————

When I click TolleyThis! it asks me to login
TolleyThis! requires an active login to work. Once you’ve logged in, you can use TolleyThis! until the next time you reset your browser or your account requires you to login again

Do I need a subscription to Tolley+™ Research?
To use TolleyThis! you need an active Tolley+™ Research subscription. If you’d like to find out more, sign up for a trial or subscribe, please visit https://www.tolley.co.uk/products/tolley-plus-research

View our privacy policy at: https://www.lexisnexis.com/global/privacy/en/privacy-policy-uk.page
